title: As a club, I want a preliminary contract to get auto-created when I draft a player
custom_steps: **AC**- When a player is drafted (the draft pick is approved by BOC), a preliminary contract is automatically generated for the player- The contract must be a first year domestic contract- The preliminary contract is created and saved by the system. It is saved with any default fields populated by the system (eg Signing date). All unpopulated fields stay blank- The preliminary contract should appear on the Contract History of the player profile

title: As a club, I would like Draft created contracts to automatically default to domestic salary scale
custom_steps: **AC**- When a contract is auto-created by the draft, the system should autopopulate and save the Addendum C on the contract with the Default domestic salary scale

title: As a BOC contract approver, I want each contract to get stamped and approved in under 5 seconds per form
custom_steps:
George Boutis [11:39 AM] 
i told perry that we should revamp stamping - remove it from esig altogether....  ran it by jose and he agrees.  this will make it standalone, and we dont worry about things like that `the call could fail if the formid isnt in the esig_header table

custom_steps:

title: As a club, I want to track all my draft contracts in one place
custom_steps:
**Wireframe:**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=draft_contracts

**AC**
- Add a new tab to the Minor Contracts Dashboard called "Draft Contracts"
- Add a new widget "Draft Contracts" with the following columns:
-- Player (Link to PPP)
-- Round
-- Overall 
-- Org (BOC only)
-- Club
-- Status(Link to contract)
-- Signing Date 
-- Contract Year
-- Signing Bonus
- Data in the table(excluding links, which are blue) should be red for Prelim, Green for TS, TA, Black for approved
- For club users, only show contracts for draft players in their org
- BOC users can see all contracts for all draft picks
- BOC has header filters to filter by Org. Default to all orgs.
- BOC and Club have a header filter that lets them navigate by year. Default to current Draft Year
- Only needs to work from year 2017 onwards
- Widget is default sorted by Overall Pick

title: As an Admin, I would like contracts with newly added attachments to be moved to the top of the clipboard
custom_steps:
**AC**
- When a Terms Submitted or Terms Accepted Contract has a contract attachment added it, the clipboard should treat this change similar to a state change and use this update date to re-sort the widget 

Original Jira:
https://jira.boc.mlb.com:8443/browse/EBISII-11320#comment-52721

title: As a Club, I want any changes to the draft order to appear correctly on the utility
Clubs should not be able to see projected signing bonus amount for other clubs
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user is logged in and viewing the R4 SB utility
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Include Projected Signings=Yes"
custom_expected:
THEN only projected signings for the logged in user's org should display
AND THIS should also apply on all exports

title: As a club, I want to see the names of players drafted in each pick
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- For the 2016 draft, show the roster names of the players drafted by that Club for each pick. - Also show the player's class- Additionally for the 2017 draft, populate the player names real time as the draft is in progress.- Player's name links to player profileNote:Discussion topic -  how do we handle changes in draft order and matching up the uploaded SB values

title: As a Club, I want to see the Signing Bonuses of the players that I have Signed
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- For all players listed on the widget, once their 1st yr dom contract reaches Terms Accepted, show the Actual Signing Bonus Value of the contract in the "Actual Bonus" Column- The Signing Bonus can come from either the Signing Bonus Clause or the Dual Sport Clause- Any contracts without one of these 2 clauses should show zero in that column- Show the total of these values in the footer- Additionally, populate the Signing Date column. It should link to contract- For the footer of the Signing Date column, show the total number of  rows where a Signing Date is populated

title: As BOC, I want to set players who are not subject to the signing deadline
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- Add the NSD column to the table visible to BOC and Clubs- BOC and club users have the same functionality, however the NSD column is not editable to Clubs- BOC can edit this column and set the NSD status of a player. Note that this field also exists on the player profile and should be editable from both places- BOC can save changes- Players who are set as NSD are not subject to the Signing Deadline. The impact of this will be covered in upcoming stories

title: As a club, I want to see my Final Signing Bonus Pool
custom_steps: - The final Actual Signing bonus pool appears in the second row of the summary header- For the 'Final' row, it is calculated as the total of the "Signing Bonus Values" for rows, irrespective of NSD, which have a Signed Date (i.e. rows in black)For example:Yankees start with an Actual Signing Bonus Pool of zero. Once the draft is finished, they negotiate and sign a player drafted in a 1st round  pick with a Signing Bonus Value of 1,000,000.So the club's new Actual Signing Bonus Pool is now 1,000,000

title: As a club, I want to see any Passed Over players that I've signed during the current Signing Period
custom_steps: **Wire**http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=club_view_1**Full set of rules**https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1262621?projectId=14044**AC**- In addition to showing draft picks, all passed over players who have a first year domestic contract that has reached Terms Accepted State are shown at the bottom of the table.- In place of Round and Overall, show "Passed Over"- The contract must be signed between the draft and the following year draft. For example, for a passed over contract to appear in the 2016 year, it should be signed between the first day of the 2016 draft and day before the 2017 draft. Any contract signed after that will appear under 2017.

title: As a club, I want to export to Excel
custom_steps: -	Club and BOC has an ‰ÛÏPrint‰Û￾ option which allows them to pick ‰ÛÏExport to Excel‰Û￾ and ‰ÛÏExport to PDF‰Û￾-	If Excel is chosen, then the contract section of the form and the totals are exported to EXCEL format. -	Formatting must match attached sample

title: As a club, I want to export utility to PDF
custom_steps: **AC**-	Club/BOC can choose to export to PDF. Formatting is similar to Excel- Note that in the attached PDF sample, some columns are named differently because it's an export from EBIS 1. In Ebis 2, the export should match the column names in EBIS 2.

title: User can create a new transfer from Player History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am in the player history section
custom_steps: WHEN I select Transfer from the Create new menu
custom_expected: THEN a preliminary transfer will open

title: BOC can receive an approval item when transfer is submitted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND a Transfer has reached the status of “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN I look at the BOC - Minor Transactions - Admin's Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN the Transfer will display
AND if a Notice of Disposition label is attached it will display
AND be available for download from the Attachments column
AND if there are comments they will display in the comments column

title: BOC can open the submitted transfer from the approvals clipboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND there is a submitted Transfer in my Approvals clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN I click on the “Type” hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN type hyperlink of a submitted transfer transaction will open the submitted transfer transaction in view mode in the same window/tab

title: BOC Can approve a transfer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a BOC user
AND I a transfer transaction state is Preliminary, “Submitted to BOC”, or Rejected
custom_steps: WHEN I click “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN the transaction status is updated to “Approved”

title: User can save a transfer transaction for a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am on a transfer transaction
custom_steps: WHEN I click Save
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction status will be set to “Preliminary”
But if it’s not the first time the transaction is being saved then the status will not change

title: Submitting a transfer should post transaction to players history
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am submitting a transfer to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN I click submit
custom_expected: THEN the transfer transaction has been successfully submitted, system creates an entry in Player's Player History: Code = TRANS, Description = Transfer to be in green font

title: User can submit a transfer to BOC for approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I have a transfer created
AND the Submit to BOC button is available
custom_steps: WHEN I click Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN the system will update the status of the transaction to “Submitted to BOC”
AND the system will reload the transaction into view mode
AND submit notification will be displayed “the transaction has successfully been submitted” in blue

title: Submitting a transfer to BOC will update a players pending ORG and club and roster status
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged in as a user
AND I am submitting a transfer
custom_steps: WHEN click submit
custom_expected:
THEN the system sets the player’s pending org and the club to the destination/target org and club from the transaction
AND the system sets the player’s pending minor league roster status to “Active” if the player’s minor league roster status is “Signed For Next Year”, and his level of play is either AA or AAA.

title: BOC Approving Release tx terminates MNC
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a release tx for a player w/a MNC
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the release tx
custom_expected:
THEN MNC status is terminated
AND terminated comment populates on MNC
